original_title: Wunder des Fliegens: Der Film eines deutschen Fliegers
overview: A young German boy meets his hero, a famous flying ace, and dreams of becoming a pilot. However, his mother--whose husband was a fighter pilot killed in battle during World War I--does not want to lose her son, too, and tries to persuade him to abandon his dreams of flying.
title: Wunder des Fliegens: Der Film eines deutschen Fliegers
